head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SCHMIERER, BERNARD A., M.D.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SCHMIERER, BERNARD A., M.D.

block.p: SCHMIERER-Bernard A., M.D. 88, died May 25, 2002. Dr. Schmierer was the beloved husband of Muriel, devoted father of Dr. Edwin Schmierer, Mark Schmierer and Dr. Jeffrey Schmierer, loving brother of Hy and the late Dr. Irving Schmierer and Lily Schuman. Adored grandfather of Michael, Robyn, Benjamin, Rebecca, Jordana, Marissa and Rachel, and cherished uncle and great-uncle. Dr. Schmierer was a founding member of the Jericho Jewish Center and was a founder and co-director of Camp Starlight, Starlight, PA. Funeral services will be held at the Jericho Jewish Center, Tuesday, May 28, at 11:30 AM, followed by burial at Wellwood Cemetery.

Dr. Schmierer was a founding member of the Jericho Jewish Center and was a founder and co-director of Camp Starlight, Starlight, PA. Funeral services will be held at the Jericho Jewish Center, Tuesday, May 28, at 11:30 AM, followed by burial at Wellwood Cemetery.
